blocks.data:
Allele Registry parses the content of VCF file sent as payload and returns the same VCF file with
additional identifiers added to ID column.

assembly.description: Reference genome assembly, possible values: NCBI36, hg18, GRCh37, hg19, GRCh38, hg38.

ids.description:
List of identifers to add to ID column (separated by commas), possible values:
* CA
* dbSNP.rs
* ClinVar.alleleId
* ClinVar.variationId
* MyVariantInfo_hg19.id
* MyVariantInfo_hg38.id
* ExAC.id
* gnomAD.id
* ClinVar.RCV
* COSMIC.id

blocks.data:
##fileformat=VCFv4.1
##contig=<ID=chr17,assembly=GRCh37>
#CHROM	POS	ID	REF	ALT	QUAL	FILTER
chr17	43009069	.	G	C	59	PASS DB
chr17 43009090	.	G	T	59	PASS DB
chr17 43009126	.	AG	A	60	PASS DB

The request returns the VCF file sent as payload, with required identifiers added to ID column for all variants that are
already registered in the Registry.

data.body:
##fileformat=VCFv4.1
##contig=<ID=chr17,assembly=GRCh37>
#CHROM	POS	ID	REF	ALT	QUAL	FILTER
chr17	43009069	.	G	C	59	PASS DB
chr17 43009090	.	G	T	59	PASS DB
chr17 43009126	.	AG	A	60	PASS DB

##fileformat=VCFv4.1
##contig=<ID=chr17,assembly=GRCh37>
#CHROM	POS	ID	REF	ALT	QUAL	FILTER
chr17	43009069	.	G	C	59	PASS DB
